bibl.bibl: Gray, Asa. 1863a. Enumeration of the species of plants collected by Dr. C. C. Parry and Messrs. Elihu Hall, and J. P. Harbour, during the summer and autumn of 1862, on and near the Rocky Mountains, in Colorado Territory, lat. 390–410. [Presented 3 March 1863.] Proceedings of the Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia (1863): 55–80.
